org.pebble.core.decoding

Class InputBitStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pebble.core.decoding.InputBitStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class InputBitStream
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Byte array input stream wrapper with useful method to read data at bit level.

        public int readDelta()
              throws IOException
        Reads positive number from delta coding into a long. (see OutputBitStream.writeDelta(int)).
        Returns:
        Read number.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case there is an exception reading from input stream.

      • read

        public void read(byte[] buffer,
        long size)
          throws IOException
        Reads size bits from input stream and sets them into buffer. (see OutputBitStream.write(byte[], long)).
        Parameters:
        buffer - where read bits will be stored.
        size - number of bits to be read.
        Throws:
        IOException - in case there is an exception reading from input stream.
